once upon a time there was a woman
peasant who grew flowers for earning
being alone for a long time made her
eager to have someone to share her
lonely life with
[Music]
this flower is so pretty and lonely just
like me
i wish someone would come and
i wish that i had a daughter she could
be great
a little fairy heard her wish and she
granted the woman a surprise
a
baby then the woman got pregnant and
gave birth to a pretty tiny girl
the girl is small like her mother's
thumb so she was called thumbelina
the mother happily put her on a flower
that made the flower fresher and more
beautiful
she also made a tiny crib of chestnut
put on some petals as a blanket for
thumbelina thumbelina often played on

water
time flew like wind thumbelina turned 20
but she was still the size of her
mother's thumb
however she never lost her love from her
mother one night when thumbelina was

next to the window a frog suddenly
appeared
the frog carefully watched thumbelina
and prepared a plan for her son's
wedding
this girl is so beautiful the best
choice for my son's bride is here
the next morning thumbelina's mother
found out that her daughter had

she tried to find her everywhere in the
house but no clues were figured out
she felt desperate
speaking of the frog
she took thumbelina to a huge pond where

the frog thought that thumbelina
couldn't run away from her
thumbelina woke up
she gradually knew that she was
kidnapped

from now on you two are husband and wife
i've prepared a room for you two in this

back off
what are you doing i will never marry
who kidnapped me
the sun frog was embarrassed
he jumped into water

thumbelina fell off into the frog's

after that incident the frog family

here flies worms butterflies anything

thank you so much i will never forget
this grace
the leaf started floating away from the

till they realized they couldn't follow
thumbelina anymore
the leaves stopped by a strange land
thumbelina was really happy that she had

after days it started snowing
thumbelina was wandering in the jungle

fortunately she found a little house and

hello mrs vol i got lost and it's

days avoiding harsh weather i will help

all right get inside there is a room for
you
the vole sympathized and agreed to let
thumbelina stay for a while
remember you need to help me with the
chores as you said
yes i understood
when spring came a mole came to vole's
house
in the party thumbelina told them many
interesting stories
the mole looked at thumbelina eagerly
this small girl looks like a delicious

where did you get that delicious brat
give her to me 30 nuts no more
oh no no no mrs mole i love her like
she's one of my grands by the way what
let me tell you this it's too good for
you with 30 nuts if you disagree with it
i will send some guys and destroy this
house

after the mole left the vole warned

unfortunately the mole saw thumbelina

how dare you sold me out vol all right
no more nuts thumbelina stop
i tell you to stop she angrily followed

grabbed small rocks and threw on the

that crack stop you hurted me this bad

gradually got close to thumbelina but

well thumbelina was thinking the mole

where are you thumbelina if i catched
you don't cry don't regret

please please help me out of here

thumbelina

i

fairy tales
deep in a certain forest where the dense
trees and blooming flowers were
interleaving peeping under the leaves
there exist some weird looking houses
actually they were the hideouts of
little fairies the fairies here all
possess a special ability
one could help plants grow strong
one was very good at controlling water
while someone can freely play with fire
well of course there are exceptions not
everyone knew and controls their
abilities well
there is a beautiful fairy named hilda
who always dreamed of being a gentle and
talented fairy but different with
everyone else
i want to be talented like them but i
don't know what my useful ability is
in this land young fairies of the same
age needed to participate in an ability
development class led by a great fairy
hi everybody let me introduce myself i
am lumeen who has the responsibility to
evaluate and assign tasks to each person
here after the examination this is the
fairy crystal which is used to test your
ability by channeling your own power
into the crystal it will automatically
absorb and manifest accordingly
the more power transmitted the more
obvious phenomena occur
this is an example
the meaning of being a fairy is to bring
happiness to the world
those who cannot do it will gradually
lose their power and disappear forever
of course i don't believe that will
happen to you guys
everyone understands right
so who will be the first to volunteer
the little fairies one after another
stepped up to test their ability
everyone tried their best and felt happy
when they could find the most suitable
ability for themselves hilda was no
exception she was also eagerly waiting
for her turn finally in her turn hilda
wanted to present herself as best as she
could she followed the previous fairies
also tried to channel the power into the
crystal weirdly the crystal only lit up
a bit and then went out it did not show
any special phenomenon
weird
you try it one more time
maybe your power isn't enough to
activate the crystal hilda did not give
up continue to try for the second time
but the result was not much different
from the previous
what if she does not have any special
power
back off hilda what are you doing here
without any power after two times with
no positive results
hilda got confused she thought that the
amount of power she had transmitted was
not enough
one more time she tried to put all her
power into the crystal the crystal began
to shine brightly it floated in the air
and immediately disappeared after a
bright light with no crystal left to
examine the abilities of those who came
after hilda she then became the center
of all grumbling
look that's a good thing you've done
where's the crystal i haven't tested my
ability yet
she lost the crystal her power made the
crystal disappear the great fairy got
disappointed the others were despising
her friends all thought that hilda's
ability was useless and even lost the
fairy crystal
all right girl what's your power if your
ability doesn't bring happiness i can't
assign you any task no i did not destroy
anything ah
i know how to turn soil into gold
[Music]
can you turn it into something else
man i i don't know
if that's all then i don't appreciate
your ability firstly gold is only
fleeting
to fairies the soil can nourish more
trees which is much more precious
[Music]
secondly the crystal has gone i can't do
examinations for the others anymore
okay i'll go talk to the patriarch about
this incident disperse everyone i will
announce later
useless
vandals
[Music]
being ridiculed for the useless ability
which even caused damage to the others
hilda was very sad and could only fall
down and cry
at the end of the day after discussing
the matter with the patriarch and
returning to the classroom teacher lumen
still found hilda sitting at a tree
stump waiting and despairing seeing
hilda's negative expression lumen walked
over to her side she wanted to give her
students some advice
you're helder right yes yes i'm sorry
i didn't mean to
about the crystal i have handled it
already you don't need to worry about it
anymore
yes but
don't think that your ability is useless
each ability is a special gift from god
there will definitely be a right way to
apply and bring happiness to life you
haven't found a reasonable way to use it
i see i'll find a way to use my power
and make people happy hearing the advice
of her teacher hilda felt strongly
boosted she began to leave and find her
own way i hope she will find the right
path soon speaking of hilda she had now
returned to her village but only watched
from afar
maybe this place is not suitable for me
should i try to go to the outside world
to find out maybe i can make someone
happy
[Music]
no sooner said than done hilda
immediately flew out of the forest hilda
was flying over a small house on the
edge of the forest when she heard the
whimpering sound of a child seeing the
room's window was open she flew over and
hid outside curiously looked inside
she saw a little boy crying and cuddling
his mother
mommy i fell off and
hit a rock my tooth fell out
it's just a baby tooth my dear no i
don't want that
all my friends praised me for having
beautiful teeth i don't want to leave it
a tooth falls out there will be a new
tooth to replace it will be much taller
and stronger than this old tooth don't
cry my dear mom can i keep it until my
new tooth replaced i can rest assured
all right go to bed early so your tooth
can grow quickly
good night mom
good night my dear love you
[Music]
the boy went back to his bed gently
cradled his tooth and prayed my teeth i
love you so much before the new tooth
come out i hope the best things will
come to you after that the boy put the
tooth under the pillow and immediately
fell into sleep
hilda listens to every word of the
touching story and the boy's prayer or
i can use my power to create gold to
replace with his tooth
she then decided to pick up some soil
and turn it into a gold coin and tried
switching it with the boys too
a gold coin for a tooth he will love it
however hilda's hasty and clumsy actions
when switching gold coin for the tooth
had woken the boy up instead of being
scared by a strange creature the boy
showed curiosity and silently watched
hilda's odd actions as soon as hilda
touched the tooth even though she didn't
use her power both her body and the
tooth brightened hilda also became
curious she began to transmit her power
into the tooth just like when she tried
with the fairy crystal suddenly the
tooth left hilda's hand soaring into the
sky
it laid still in the sky
and shone really beautifully
after witnessing his tooth turn into a
shiny spot in the sky the little boy
couldn't hold his feeling anymore
awesome
hilda was startled and flew away but
still lingered outside the house and
overheard interesting words
mommy mommy i just saw a fairy she took
my broken tooth and turned it into a
glittering thing in the sky
well she even left a gold coin look
not just that from the boy appeared
lights flew out
and entered hilda's body she then
gradually felt the boy's happiness and
herself become stronger
hilda immediately understood how she had
made a small world happy
this is great turns out that making
others happy feels like this
since then she was motivated and decided
to become a tooth fairy
she flew away using the gold coin to
switch with the teeth of boys and girls
and creating a sky full of beautiful
glittering lights which they called
stars
then the boys and girls gradually spread
the story about the fairy who switched
their teeth with gold coins and they
called her the tooth fairy
fairy tales
once upon a time there was a flower
fairy who ruled a beautiful kingdom
called minnesota
that is why the kingdom was full of
beautiful blooming flowers
in a peaceful village inside a kingdom
there was a poor farmer named rosa
who was very beautiful gentle and kind
she loved to plant flowers and play with
birds
in her spare time she often went to the
flower field in the village and took
care of the birds
in her garden
she also planted all kinds of flowers
and took care of them very well
rosa had a neighbor whose name was
melanie
an evil witch
because she always disguised herself to
look normal
no one knew that she was a witch
in contrast to rosa she was very cunning
and cruel
she had a snake shaped stick
which was always with her
she often consulted it and it often told
her to do bad things
melanie also loved planting flowers
oh my beautiful flowers
but her flowers were always withered and
never looked fresh
she looked at her neighbor's beautiful
garden
she was very jealous and angry because
rosa was more beautiful than her
and her garden was also very beautiful
one day
a beautiful and colorful bird flew to
the witch's garden
it sang some beautiful songs to welcome
the spring
but unfortunately
its songs accidentally walked the wicked
witch melanie up
this
annoying bird ruined my sleep
melanie angrily took the snake stick
heading to the garden
as soon as she found the
she swung her stick up
a cloud of smoke straight towards the
bird and swept it away
the beautiful bird fell on the side of
rosa's garden
making the witch very satisfied
at that moment rosa returned home and
saw everything
oh poor you bird go with me i will

thanks to rosa's care
the beautiful bird quickly recovered
the bird was very happy and felt
grateful to her when you feel better
i'll bring you back to the forest
suddenly the bird transformed into a

i am a flower fairy
each year i turned into a bird for one
day but when i got here i was injured
fortunately you saved me and took care
of me
i want to repay you
rosa
what do you wish for
you're a flower fairy can you give me
lots of precious flowers from around the

that is simple

immediately a beam of light threw a
round rosa
i will give you my power
now
all the flowers you plant will grow up
really fast
you can also save the withered flowers
i will ask the birds to bring you lots
of valuable flower seeds
that's great thank you so much
the very flower disappeared
since then every few days the birds

thanks to that
rosa had a beautiful flower garden full

no one in that kingdom had

that's why people always liked her
